name: Corki
title: the Daring Bombardier
lore: The yordle pilot Corki loves two things above all others: flying, and his glamorous mustache... though not necessarily in that order. After leaving Bandle City, he settled in Piltover and fell in love with the wondrous machines he found there. He dedicated himself to the development of flying contraptions, leading an aerial defense force of seasoned veterans known as the Screaming Yipsnakes. Calm under fire, Corki patrols the skies around his adopted home, and has never encountered a problem that a good missile barrage couldn't solve.
blurb: The yordle pilot Corki loves two things above all others: flying, and his glamorous mustache... though not necessarily in that order. After leaving Bandle City, he settled in Piltover and fell in love with the wondrous machines he found there. He...
allytips: Phosphorus Bomb can be used to reveal enemy units that might be hiding in a nearby patch of brush.
Valkyrie can be used defensively as well, so try using it for a quick escape.
Corki can continue to attack while using Gatling Gun. Maximizing Gatling Gun is key to mastering Corki.
enemytips: Watch out for Corki's Missile Barrage. They deal splash damage, so you can get hit even when hiding behind minions.
Corki is vulnerable after he uses his Valkyrie or Special Delivery, so try switching focus to him if he uses them to enter a fight.

riot_spell_q.name: Phosphorus Bomb
riot_spell_q.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
riot_spell_q.tooltip: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAD> <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to enemies in the target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for {{ e2 }} seconds (does not reveal stealth).

riot_spell_w.name: Valkyrie
riot_spell_w.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Active: Corki flies a short distance, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path.

Special Delivery: Corki flies a great distance, dropping bombs that knock aside enemies and leave a burning trail for 5 seconds. The trail slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% and burns them for {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage per second.

riot_spell_e.name: Gatling Gun
riot_spell_e.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Corki's gatling gun fires continuously at targets in front of him for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and reducing up to {{ e4 }} armor and magic resist.

Gatling Gun's damage is {{ e7 }}% physical, {{ e8 }}% magic.
Defense reductions last for {{ e6 }} seconds after last being damaged by Gatling Gun.

riot_spell_r.name: Missile Barrage
riot_spell_r.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Active: Corki fires a missile that explodes at the first enemy it hits, dealing {{ rsmallmissiledamage }} magic damage to all nearby enemies.

Corki can store up to 7 missiles, and every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing {{ rbigonemultiplier*100 }}% damage ({{ rbigmissiledamage }}).

riot_spell_i.name: Hextech Munitions
riot_spell_i.description: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Hextech Munitions
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Hextech Shrapnel Shells:}} '''Corki's''' [[basic attack]]s are permanently modified to deal {{as|20% AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} and {{as|80% AD}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|The Package:}} After 8 minutes have passed, ''{{ai|The Package|Corki}}'' is delivered to both corners of '''Corki's''' [[Spawn|fountain]], which he can pick up after {{ct|channel|channeling|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts}} for 1 second. Doing so grants him one cast of {{ai|Special Delivery|Corki}} within the next 60 seconds, as well as {{sti|ms|{{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} out of combat prior to the ability being cast, after which ''{{ai|The Package|Corki}}'' goes on {{sti|cooldown}} before being delivered again.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* All players are warned by Corki emitting a global siren/alarm sound upon picking up ''The Package''.
* Triggering attacks will apply [[on-hit effect]]s normally.
** The bonus damage from {{nie|Spellblade}} will not be consumed if the magic damage part is enough to kill the target.
** Furthermore, the bonus damage from physical {{nie|Spellblade}} effects (namely {{ii|Sheen}}, {{ii|Iceborn Gauntlet}}, and {{ii|Trinity Force}}) will be split evenly between physical and magic damage.
** The damage from {{iis|Runaan's Hurricane}} {{nie|Wind's Fury}} is not affected by ''Hextech Munitions''.
** Both components apply {{sti|life steal}} even though on-hit magic damage does not usually interact with it.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} amplify both components' damage.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Phosphorus Bomb
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' launches a bomb at the target area, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: The bomb {{tip|sight|reveals}} the area as it travels and for 6 seconds afterwards, as well as all affected enemies.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Valkyrie
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location, dropping bombs that leave up to 3 blazing patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled, lasting for 2 seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: Any enemies that remain in the area are dealt {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|15 to 45}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|15*8 to 45*8}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.notes: * The trail is made up of three individual areas-of-effects (unlike {{cai|Poison Trail|Singed}} or {{cais|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana}} trail being more fluid).

wikia_skill_w2.name: Special Delivery
wikia_skill_w2.blurb: Corki hurtles forward a long distance, knocking aside enemies and creating a trail of scorched earth that damages opponents who remain in it.
wikia_skill_w2.description: {{sbc|{{ai|The Package|Corki}} - Active:}} '''Corki''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location with extreme speed, {{tip|unstoppable}} and {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} all enemies hit 500 units and leaving behind a fire trail for 5 seconds.
wikia_skill_w2.description2: Any enemies that remain in the area are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% and dealt {{pp|18|7.5;7.5;7.5;7.5;7.5;7.5;7.5 to 17.5;20;22.5;25|formula=static 7.5 until lvl 7; then+1.25 until lvl 15, then+2.5|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, for a maximum of {{pp|18|7.5*20;7.5*20;7.5*20;7.5*20;7.5*20;7.5*20;7.5*20 to 17.5*20;20*20;22.5*20;25*20|formula=static 150 until lvl 7; then+25 until lvl 15, then+50|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 750% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}}.
wikia_skill_w2.notes: * Unlike {{ai|Valkyrie|Corki}}, the trail is fluid like {{cai|Poison Trail|Singed}} or {{cai|Dragon's Descent|Shyvana}}'s trail.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Gatling Gun
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' activates his gatling gun and sprays bullets in a cone in front of him for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts {{as|physical|physical damage}} and {{as|magic|magic damage}} damage every quarter-second and reducing his targets' {{sti|lethality|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} each tick, stacking up to 8 times, lingering for 2 seconds after last being damaged.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling: {{st|Mixed Damage Per Quarter Second|{{ap|120/16 to 320/16}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|120 to 320}} {{as|(+ 160% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}{{st|Resistance Reduction Per Tick|{{ap|1 to 2.5}}|Total Resistance Reduction|{{ap|1*8 to 2.5*8}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.description2: ''Gatling Gun'' does not hinder '''Corki's''' actions and its cone remains in front of him as he moves.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Missile Barrage
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Corki''' stores a charge of ''Missile Barrage'' periodically, up to a maximum of 7 at once, and starts with 7 missiles every time he [[Death|respawns]].
wikia_skill_r1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Corki''' fires a missile in the target direction that explodes if it hits an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} in an area.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: Every third missile '''Corki''' fires is a ''{{ai|Big One|Corki}}'', dealing 100% increased [[damage]] and increasing its explosion [[range|radius]].
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|90 to 140}} {{as|(+ {{ap|15 to 75}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Big One Magic Damage|{{ap|90*2 to 140*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|30 to 150}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}}}
